title: Lita (wrestler)
summary: Amy Christine Dumas (/dʊˈmɑː/; born April 14, 1975), better known by her ring name Lita, is an American retired professional wrestler, animal welfare activist, and former singer. She performed as a full-time wrestler with WWE from 2000 to 2006 and has since made part-time appearances with the company. Often regarded as one of the greatest women's performers, she was also one of the most popular female superstars in World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) and was inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame in 2014.
